author: LDNIO
body: Great app, I used it to hide Add to cart button, and the tech support stuff helped me to remove the extra blank space, thanks a lot.

author: Walk Around Kitty
body: This app is essential for every store. It works efficiently and I believe it has increased my store's conversion rate.

author: Lille Søn
body: Works well. First it didn´t work in my theme, but a quick support from the dev fixed this problem. Recommend it.

author: The Coffee Shopping Network
body: seems to work well and helps with conversions. It would be good the see if their is a way in the future to gather stats.

author: HN Bazar
body:
The support team help to upgrade my store to the next level.
I have 2 apps from this company and both of working perfect and support add for a customization very fast.
Very professional support.
Thanks

author: Winade-Shop - Leckere Bioerfrischungen
body: I used it to make the product fee app run. Without it the app did not work. The support was good and fast.

author: tlant
body:
The app does what it says.
And support is fast and professional. I have requested to make a minor adjustment and they did this right away.

author: Crank Baiter
body: Works fine for desktop but on mobile, the page refreshes as soon as I click on the quantity which does not allow me enough time to enter the desired quantity. UPDATE: The team contacted me promptly and it had to do something with the theme that I was using and not the App itself and their willingness to help is greatly appreciated.

author: SUPERGSUND.DE
body: Very little, but very helpful App for every Shopify-Store. Makes it much more easier for all customers handling already added products in his shopping cart as you must not always click and click and click funny buttons. Works perfect on Desktop, mobil and Tablet. Support is very fast and friendly. Top!

author: Scuba Beer
body: App works great and as described. The support team reply and attend to slight tweaks in the software straight away. Would recommend.

author: OTAA
body:
Amazing application,
great service and really save time printing 500 orders at a time.
If you guys can roll out
- Sort by Product SKU before generating packing slips / invoices (right now its only product name, you can sort by SKU in the picking list)
- Being able to highlight certain keywords within certain fields to help staff pick up certain keywords. (The CSS edits aren't able to do this) Would make this great app even greater.
Thanks guys!
developer_reply:
Thank you for sharing your 5-star experience with us 😊 We're glad you are enjoying our app. 
Your feedback is super helpful for our development team. We will take it into account. 
Have a great day. 
Kind Regards,
Sarah / FORSBERG+two

author: Three Tarts
body: We use this app to organize the orders at our bakeshop. The picking list allows us to quickly total the number of each product that we need for the day. And the print out allows us to sort by order number or time of pickup, which we use when packaging up our orders and as a reference when customers are picking up their orders. Very helpful and a big time saver. Recently, I reached out for support and they went above & beyond to make sure a feature was working properly for us. Thank-you for your friendly support. We really appreciate it!
developer_reply:
...and we really appreciate customers like you! Thank you for the kind review. We take pride in friendly and helpful customer service, so we appreciate that you noticed :)
Kind Regards,
Sarah / FORSBERG+two

author: Millie & Dot
body: This app has streamlined our order prepping process. Customer service responded to a modification we needed quickly and competently!
developer_reply:
Thank you so much for the five stars and for sharing your feedback. Excellent to hear it has helped you streamline your order prepping process! 
Kind Regards,
Sarah / FORSBERG+two

author: Scented Narcissi
body: I honestly can't rate this app highly enough! It has helped solve so many of our order processing problems from pick lists to printing gift messages and we couldn't function without it! Whenever I have had a query it has been dealt with instantly and there is always someone to help. Thank you so much!
developer_reply:
Wow, we're blown away by your positive words and appreciate the time you took to write such an excellent review!
Kind Regards,
Sarah / FORSBERG+two

author: helloclayre
body: Best customer support! Replied in a few minutes with the right solution! Highly recommend the apps from Forsberg :)
developer_reply:
That's music to our ears! Thank you for taking the time to leave a review :) 
Kind Regards,
Sarah / FORSBERG+two

author: Hewitt's Meats
body:
I have used Orderly Print through 2 of my peak seasons now. It is the best packing slip app I could find and they have been great to work with. My team was not noticing when there were multiples of a single item when it was really busy, so we were short picking customer orders. I reached out on a Sunday in December to see if they could make a tweak to help me make the quantity larger when there was more than a quantity of one. I now have it pop up in red and 300 times larger! That problem went away completely. The ease of use of the app was always great, but I was so impressed with the support I got during the peak times of the year. I also like how they have worked together the app Order Tagger to make both of their applications better. Thank you Orderly Print!! Brian Hanson
HewittsMeats.com
developer_reply:
Thanks Brian! Reviews like yours make our day because it makes all the hard work worthwhile. It's so fantastic that OrderlyPrint has made a difference for you and your team. 
Kind regards, 
Sarah / FORSBERG+two

author: Chinga Clothing
body: Great app! The customer service team was extremely quick to reply and assist with our queries. Highly recommend !
developer_reply:
We appreciate the fantastic review and are glad we could be of service. If you have any further needs or questions, please reach out!
Kind regards, 
Sarah / FORSBERG+two

author: Mask Co
body: Perfect!! Excellent app for detailed invoices particularly if you have many variants etc like colors and sizes. Easy to edit or add/remove information. Support is the best I have ever experienced with thorough, detailed responses and instructions. Excellent.
developer_reply:
Great to hear our support team was able to help you out, and so good to hear you think our app is the best ;) Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. 
Kind regards, 
Sarah / FORSBERG+two

author: Alto Collective
body: We use this app daily to delegate work tasks, sort and print slimmed down order "Picking Lists" which ends up being our build sheets, and then are able to print basic address labels for select orders not requiring our thermal printer+tracked shipping. Developers are quick to help out with any issues you may have, overall we have had only 2 random issues occur in the last 5 years, and these seemed to be syncing issues caused on the Shopify side. The team had workarounds in under 24 hrs for both those instances so we could get back up and running with virtually no downtime. Highly recommended.
developer_reply:
What a pleasure to hear! Thanks for taking the time to leave a review :)
Kind regards,
Sarah / FORSBERG+two

author: Dunns Bakery Local Delivery
body: Great app, helpful and fast responses on queries. V happy. Invoices and pick lists look great so yeah happy days.

author: Cloudyfuser UK
body: Yes I agree this app is unfortunately useless.... so waste of time... Hmmmm Does not do anything at all

author: Jack Stillman
body: So mad at PayPal and this app. I used the features but decided they were not adding any value so I uninstalled. I now have code embedded (god knows where), in my site. I contacted PayPal to ask for assistance to turn off the incessant pop-ups and they told me they had never heard of this app. After submitting screenshots my request was closed and they advised me to pay for a developer to try and remove it. F** you PayPal!

author: THE FOSSIL STORE
body: We have just installed this app and waited an hour after activation to see if it might be slow on updating and nothing happens, it simply doesn't work.

author: BostonsBestJeweler
body: Every single person who works at paypal is incompetent. That goes for everyone who developed this app also.

author: FreshForPandas
body: Ap didn’t work - error messages upon install. Even the download link for the app att the PayPal site just goes to an error page. Support did not respond

author: USAWIDGETTS
body:
It stared find , but after using it for few days it when away , I try to re-installed a few times with no luck , it will be nice to get it back to work on my site .
www.usawidgetts.com

author: The Happy tourists
body: If you want to lose sales please install this app. What a crap because of this I lost almost 20 orders it doesn't login the user and thus they leave. :(

author: Independent Reign
body: This app changed a setting in my PayPal account that effectively blocked incoming international payments.  International customers were unable to complete purchases using PayPal.  I had no idea and could not figure out what the issue was and lost sales because of it.  Finally had a customer patient enough to describe her experience in attempting to check out... I provided the info to PayPal and was told about the changed setting which coincided with the day I downloaded this App.  Beware of this.  Not happy.

author: Club Vest Biker Motorcycle Apparel & Accessories
body: Been with PayPal for 15 years or more, this is an easy app, works great simple setup and customer can close it too, used to have a manual banner on our old site, did increase sales to qualified buyers. some love paypal some hate, but they WILL increase sales

author: Warrior Eco Power Equipment
body: I needed to copy orders and customers across to a new site. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars was that I could not do so without copying across products (the products were already in the new site so I had to delete these and copy again). The orders that were copied across triggered email notifications which was also not expected - so it would be nice if the documentation had let us know that before hand.
developer_reply: Hi, this is Guille from the Duplicate app. Thanks for your review and for sharing your experience with our app. It's correct that for exporting orders, we need to map first the product ids between the two stores. That's why products need to be exported first. If not, orders will be empty. Regarding the orders email notifications, just clarify that customers don't get any emails when new orders are exported through our app. It's just the store owner who gets them if in the destination store has the "New order" notification option activated in the "Staff order notifications" section at /admin/settings/notifications.

author: MoringaProducts
body: Fantastic app and even better customer support. I have used this app twice now and on the second it did not all go to plan, however the customer support was right there and fixed the issues straight away. Highly reccomend!
developer_reply: Thank you for the kind words! We're very proud of our support team, glad to hear you had a positive experience.

author: Perun moto
body: Easy and straightforward process. All our product images, including alt text, we successfully copied, all pages, collections etc.
developer_reply: Thanks for your review! And thanks for letting know others!

author: NeighborsOutlet
body: Good customer service, if you did not receive feedback from the developer, please check "trash" or "spam" folder in the email.
developer_reply: Glad to hear that!

author: Lichtadler
body:
excellent service!
also customer support is super friendly and always easy to reach.
store was duplicated in a few minutes

author: LUXX
body: Good app and works well, does what it promises to do. It's great if you need an entire store copied, which is labor intensive and difficult to do without a tool like Duplicate.
developer_reply: Wow, we're so glad to hear that! Thank you for taking the time to write a review.

author: Nestor Liquor
body: Used the app and it didn't duplicate a ton of products and collections properly. Our store is a mess. Tried reaching out and haven't heard back either to fix it. Would love to get a response and get this resolved but for now this is the case.
developer_reply: Hi, we are sorry about that. We wrote you back to info@nestorliquor.com last Thursday, May 20th. The email was from support@smallvictories.co. Please double-check your inbox as it should be there. In any case, we reviewed your export, and we could see all products and collections have been exported, so we guess the problem might be something else. Probably related with a third-party app integration you might have on your original store? But let's keep the conversation through email. Please reply to our previous email or write us at support@smallvictories.co (with .co, not .com). Thanks and looking forward to having this issue fixed asap.

author: ShopViajecito
body: Excellent app. Can't make duplicating your store any easier. Customer service was also very quick to respond and efficient!
developer_reply: Thanks for taking time out of your day to leave a review! We're happy you're loving the app. 🙂

author: Shopitcheap
body: Great app! Had problem importing and the support rep replied in a very short time and resolved the problem. Great!

author: Blad Shop
body: Great app! Had problem importing and the support rep replied in a very short time and resolved the problem. Great!

author: torresgaha
body: It is not very good. The price of the items are too high. It cannot help me to see the true value of the product. Thus, $800+ bike is ridiculus.
developer_reply:
Hi Torresgaha,
You found one of our brand-approved dropshipping products, which are some of our users' favorite products. This is because they have guaranteed minimum gross margins. 
We welcome you and all JD Sourcing users to check out our growing catalog of brand-approved products here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1mq7tooaIm6QQ8ke07ciHmqpxfzQW3DzlD1LvGDEDA7s/edit#gid=0
These are products that D2C brands have approved for JD Sourcing merchants to sell, and most have minimum advertised price (MAP) policies, which you can see in the product listing and Google Sheet.
For example, our electric bikes usually sell at minimum retail prices of $1000-2000, meaning our merchants make hundreds of dollars for each sale. Any sales below the MAP price will not ship out, which means no price wars.
We welcome you to connect with our support team if you have any questions on how to get the most out of JD Sourcing at support-jdsourcing@jd.com.
Best,
Alex
Head of JD Sourcing

author: SSFsports
body: Overall good, the biggest problem is that there is no customer service, no one responds to you, no sense of security
developer_reply:
Hello SSF Sports team,
Thank you for your feedback, and congratulations on starting your new store. I believe there's a lot JD Sourcing can do to support your business. To clarify, JD Sourcing's team works Monday - Friday, and we received your request on the weekend. Our team responds to all user requests within one working day, and we look forward to helping you find something you're excited to sell.
Best,
Alex 
Head of JD Sourcing

author: Turtle and Rabbit
body: It's gonna be much better if they spend more time on their product description pages and product images. Adding the descriptions so the products in the products pool can be more convincing. And the photos are very low quality in most cases.
developer_reply:
Dear Turtle and Rabbit,
Thank you for sharing your feedback. We understand this is essential for merchant success, and will continue to invest more into improving the site. In the meantime, we hope you can find attractive products for your new store - please feel free to contact our support team with any questions and they will be happy to support: support-jdsourcing@jd.com 
Best,
Alex Rudnicki
Head of JD Sourcing

author: Famazing Deals
body: Great app. There's room for improvement, but the customer service is great! I feel like they're doing their best to provide the best service in the industry.
developer_reply: Thank you for the kind feedback, we greatly appreciate it! We'll keep working hard to make the service better and better for merchants.

author: The Modus Life
body: This is the next evolution of of ecommerce whether you are dropshipping, white labelling or have a brand! JD provides a Fortune 500 company level sourcing, logistics and super fast shipping. Alex and Kevin have been attentive to every detail in our business and is very much so an extension to our team. They have been extremely helpful in helping us understand what they have to offer and we are highly impressed! This service is exactly what Shopify merchants have been needing for so long but were unable to find. You owe it to your business to install this app and take you store to the next level!
developer_reply:
Dear Modus team,
I want to express our team's appreciation for this review - it means a lot! It's a pleasure to work with exceptional teams such as yours, and we hope to continue earning your trust.
Best,
Alex Rudnicki
Head of JD Sourcing

author: Fun & Nifty Gift Shop
body: These guys are AWESOME! Alex has been extremely helpful in helping us understand what they have to offer and we are highly impressed! This service is exactly what US shopify merchants have been needing for so long but were unable to find. The product exclusivity feature is really great and is something other companies don't seem to care about. I guess they just care about moving units and have no concern for the clients they serve. That's certainly not the case here. Do yourself a favor and install this app. It takes product sourcing and 3PL to a whole new level!
developer_reply:
Dear Fun & Nifty Gift Shop,
Thank you so much for sharing this feedback - we are grateful for the opportunity to work with you. Our team works hard to support exceptional businesses like yours, and we will continue to do our best to improve.
Best,
Alex Rudnicki
Head of JD Sourcing

author: Luminbeam
body: This is the app that saves my store! I own a business just by myself and was frustrated about sourcing and shipping my orders. Then I found JD Sourcing, and they are very responsive and responsible. JD team can help source your product from local suppliers and found the best quality products, and offer much faster shipping than other service agents. Alex is my account manager, and he is very nice and patient. I definitely believe I can gain success with him and the whole team!
developer_reply:
Dear Luminbeam,
Thank you so much for sharing this review! We are grateful for the opportunity to support your new business, and excited to see you continue to grow.
Best,
Alex
Head of JD Sourcing

author: Get Future Clean
body: This app is amazing and changing the way I feel about dropshipping.This app got me so excited to start dropshipping again and I haven't looked back. The JD team's speed and communication at helping merchants succeed has been amazing. Highly recommend if you are currently drop-shipping or thinking of drop-shipping products.
developer_reply:
Dear Get Future Clean,
Thanks so much for your feedback! We're so excited that you've been able to build your business by dropshipping our brand-approved products. Supporting stores like yours are exactly why we launched JD Sourcing, and what keeps us pushing to improve every day.
To your continued success,
Alex
Head of JD Sourcing

author: cuddlypoodle
body: With JD Sourcing, I can be well assured that my products are great quality (as vetted by the JDS team), super quick shipping times, and that I have top notch customer service. Alex and team do everything in their best ability to make sure that you're well taken care off. High recommended!
developer_reply:
Dear Cuddly Poodle,
Thank you so much for taking the time to share this kind review. Having the opportunity to support great stores like yours are part of what keeps us pushing to improve and provide the best support every day.
Cheers,
Alex
Head of JD Sourcing

author: Kittykatclub
body: This service is great. As soon as I saw JD I knew that I could trust the supply chain and quality of the service. I'm able to source and fulfill products from their overseas warehouses as well as from China, which is great. Having the option to source my own products and have JD take care of all of the fulfillment is great. Their product pool seems to carry things I don't see on other services. It's small, but at least I can trust everything is real and good quality - and with better fulfillment times. Looking forward to them filling out their product pool more, but in the meantime the custom sourcing service+overseas warehousing is a game changer.
developer_reply:
Dear Kittykatclub,
Thank you so much for writing this review of our service. We founded JD Sourcing with the goal of serving great businesses like yours, and look forward to continuing to support you in the future.
Cheers!
Alex
Head of JD Sourcing

author: Uniqueful
body: Really promising but I receive no contact from Custom Gateway and upon reaching out to the support team was told the app is not available unless you are an enterprise and pricing starts from £2000 to just “install” the app. Completely misleading as the documentation says this service is free of charge and you pay a small fee per order.

author: SangareeXP
body: App stop working suddenly absolutely no customer service even via email you will not get a response ..please do not install this app it will break your website

author: ExcellentSupply.com
body: Big disappointment. I was hoping for a way to add some nice tables to descriptions. But this was a waste of $30.

author: Chideno Canada
body: Seen it in action with the Supply theme and it was great. Easy to install and use right from the product page.

author: Ocho Select
body: I needed a flash sale banner for my client, so I created a design seamlessly! However, I wasn't seeing the banner when I would check my site. I contacted their live chat and Ella immediately fixed the issue and even showed me the simple correction for what happened! Definitely recommend!

author: Melania Gorini Jewellery
body: Ho usato questa app per creare un banner per informare i miei clienti della possibilità di pagare in 3 rate. Devo ammettere che ci sono ancora delle cose da migliorare, all'inizio il pop up non funzionava come speravo ma do 5 stelle per l'assistenza fenomenale ricevuta per risolvere il problema (il giorno di Pasqua tra l'altro!) L'assistente è stata disponibilissima ed ha risolto i miei problemi, grazie mille!

author: Couples Collections
body: Just started using Store SEO and I'm very impressed. Excellent UI and clear design and directions. Perfect for someone like me who knows nothing about this but wants to improve.

author: Royalties with IDILIMLY/LOR
body: website is cool now it just doesn't load at all sad i been using this app for months and storeseo was the best one now it doesn't even go to home page without erroring out please fix the app it should work perfectly for business
developer_reply:
Thanks for reaching out to us. We've just fixed this issue in our App so it wont happen again. I believe our support team already informed you regarding this.
Feel free to reach us when you need any help.
Have a good day!

author: DJ TechTools
body: No longer works. Shows HTTP Error 500 when trying to access the app and clicking on the login button on the frontend does nothing.

author: DigiverseStore

author: Gunskins
body: It's great to see the integration from our Amazon Seller Account. The metrics show how many signs ups were successful.

body: I like it bkjbkjbgkgjgjgk hgjhgj jvghjvj jbkjb

author: Flower Box Wall Gardens
body: This is great application, love the features

author: CSB-Coventry
body: Fantastic app. It makes my product pages so much neater. I had a slight issue that support quickly resolved in a matter of hours. Incredible support. Really happy with this app. Surprised at some of the poor feedback about support from other people - I found them to be excellent and really quick too.

author: iSupplies.ca

does not work waste your time and money, and very poor customer service
good luck, with DescriptionTable

author: 'Choleture
body: This is an incredibly useful app for individuals who are looking for clean well formatted table style descriptions without having to convert to HTML.  The installation was seamless with zero complications and you simply enter the data you want to show on your website into each line of the table.  Very simple and user friendly would definitely recommend to anyone who wants to do it themselves without dealing with html coding.

author: Rc District
body: I expected better support from this developer. Support had me add them as staff so they could review the setup. They logged in once and I never heard anything back from them. I gave them a week before I deleted them as staff and two weeks before I left this feedback. We have goals go achieve and time is of the essence.

author: The Melbourne Vent Company
body:
Great little app for making neat and presentable tables for your products.
Fantastic customer support also!

author: S&B
body: Application facile à utiliser, et support client super réactif il répondent très vite et vous aide à mettre en place vos pop up ! Je recommande

author: Fragrancebuy.ca
body: Because offers a unique set of tools which have helped us spice up our product pages. They have a beautiful and intuitive UI and their banners speak for themselves. On top of all this, they have a great team that is extremally helpful, shoutout to Ash and the team!
developer_reply:
Thanks for the review! It's been so awesome working with you guys to get set up! Love to see all your dynamic product page content now working flawlessly for you guys without code. 
-Ashland, Founder

body: Super cool apps with many great features and designs, and most importantly is that the support team is always available and are very helpful

author: itzoo
body: This is one of the best apps I have used with Shopify. The support has been great and very quick! I needed some customisations and the team were able to assist quickly and efficiently. Thank you!

author: BMBSHLL
body: Really a great app for boosting your sales. Customer service have always been on point, helpful, right there. Very happy with it! Thanks!

Thanks so much for the review- we're so glad you've been enjoying Because!
-Arsal, Customer Support

author: Peachy Athletic
body: Recently switched over from Rivo and really impressed so far! I love the additional functionality that this app gives. It also allows VIP tiers without charging you an arm and a leg per month. And not to mention top notch support! Alex has pretty much held my hand through this whole process (even though it was seamless and easy to start, just a few hours to set up) - he’s been by my side the entire time and ensured a seamless transition from our old app. Imported all of our customer data and helped me get to production quickly!!! I’m impressed so far!
developer_reply:
Dear team atPeachy Athletic❤️,
We’re blown away by your kind words 🥰! Your words lifted our spirits today. It means so much to us when our customers appreciate the hard work that goes into making each day at Growave memorable✨.
Thanks again, and have a wonderful day ❤🤗!

author: es16.dk
body: Fantastisk service. Hjælper altid når der problemer. Svare hurtig og præsis på tingene så tingene er til at løse
developer_reply:
Hey Thomas✨, 
Thank you for this great and valuable feedback. It means a lot to our whole team and we are happy that we were helpful to you😊! 
We do really appreciate your time and such a kind customer like you help us to improve and your warm words motivate us to better our service and app. We will do our best to continue providing the best service ever🥰!

author: tarallificiosantabarbara
body: questa app mi ha dato la possibilità di far scegliere i prodotti da inserire nel bundle, funziona e fa quello che serve
developer_reply:
Thank you so much for your great & valuable feedback. :)  
For any queries, feel free to contact us through in-app chat or email us at hello@thimatic.com, we are always happy to help you.

author: Premium Crafted
body: This app has very helpful to get bundles on our site, and despite a few bugs the customer support has been excellent! We're very happy with how it turned out.
developer_reply:
Thank you for sharing your valuable experience with our app and service!
It means a lot to us. :)
For any queries, feel free to contact us through in-app chat or email us at hello@thimatic.com, we are always happy to help you.

author: Marcies Vintage Toys Crafts And More
body: a great asset to my shopify store!

author: Kayvarstore
body: Does exactly what it says and i have to admit that the video tutorial's completely brilliant! did some small changes on my own and everything works. There is some work you have to do on your end but the instructions are darn clear. In fact, i think they cannot be any clearer. Set up took about 20-40 mins including all the registration on amazon's end but it's well worth it!

author: Espace Coffee
body:
we love this app.. especially it's free and it works as promised.. so far we haven't had any complaints..
thanks a lot

author: Socheap89
body: Good app and easy to integrate

author: Rays Jewellery
body: Great app and great support! Makes everything that more tidy.

author: Leona Brava Organic
body: Really like this app! so happy to install it to our store :) highly recommended! The support is very helpful !!!
developer_reply:
Thanks so much for the review- we're so glad you've been enjoying Because!
-Arsal, Customer Support

author: Dermetech
body: Great customer service - awesome app. I installed the app and I had a little issue, customer service responded almost instantly and fixed the issue in less than 5 min. I recommend this app.
developer_reply:
So glad we were able to support you! Let us know if you ever need anything else and good luck customizing all your product pages :)
- Jonathan, Product Success

author: William Wood Mirrors
body: Fantastic app. What we really love about Because is the ease of displaying our companies USP's in the product page. The app's very easy to understand and navigate, it also has plenty of helpful information for your consumption should you have any problems. Keep up the good work guys!
developer_reply:
Thanks for the review William Wood Mirrors team! 
I'm glad you've been able to emphasize your unique selling points on each of your product pages using Because! It's been awesome to see how you've grown your use of the app since we met you way back in the day. 
We can't wait to continue supporting you on your journey to personalized product pages. Cheers! 
Ashland, Founder & CEO

author: East Meets West USA
body: Had one of the worst experiences with this app. Couldn't even begin to describe the months of back and forth while we helped them solved coding issue, fix crucial bugs and glitches. There is WAY too many codes that Growave implements on your site, 30+. This causes website to be slow and the user experience to be horrible. We upgraded our theme and deleted all the Growave codes because we were going to delete the App. Somehow we noticed that there was Growave code in the new theme! How it got there is highly suspicious. We deleted that App immediately after that. Over all this app is very novice in terms of functionality.

author: Your J Beauty
body: Smooth communication and great support ! An all-in-one app for useful features for an e-shop. I personally recommend. Looking forward for the further Growave development.
developer_reply:
Hey Your J-beauty team, 
Thank you very much for your kind words 😍.
We truly appreciate you as our customer, thank you for using our app and leaving such a positive review ✨.
We take every feedback into account because our customers are the number one priority to all of our staff 🙌.
We are glad to be helpful to you and we are always happy to help you 😊.   
Once again we are grateful for clients like you and hope you stick with us for years to come 🤗!

author: Beautinow
body: I would say Growave is the best loyalty/review/wishlist app in the market. With Growave, you don't need to download five different programs simply to get one feature, and you'll save a lot of money in the process. Aside from that, the app developer will always be happy to assist you in customizing the app to better match your theme. Fast, accurate, personable, and patient customer service. Incredible app.
developer_reply:
Hi darling, Beautinow,
We really appreciate your warm words 🌷!
Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us. It is a great joy for our whole team that you love our features and highly appreciated our customer service. 😊 Your praise gives us the motivation to provide service with great pleasure🙌🏻!

author: AccGamer
body: Greatest apps i've ever installed, support also fast and to the point for my problem and trouble, I love it :D
developer_reply:
Hi AccGamer Team😇,
You are awesome!😊Thank you so much for your kind words and for the wonderful review. We greatly appreciate you using our app. We listen to our customers because you are all important to us, and it is our great pleasure to help you with your concerns. Once again, thanks a lot for leaving such a positive review. Let us know anytime if there's anything else we can be of service💕
Best wishes,
Growave Team😇

author: Nordic Plug
body: Good app - many functions in one APP. Will decrease your APP clutter. Maybe the best support I have ever encountered.
developer_reply:
Dear team at Nordic Plug❤,
It makes our day to hear that we were able to provide you with 5-star service✨. We’ll make sure the entire team receives your feedback – they’ll be thrilled to hear your kind words. Thank you so much for choosing Growave❤️!

author: Born Nouli
body: Great app and support was quick and super helpful. Easy to use and any problems and the guys are on hand to get any tweaks or problems sorting quickly.
developer_reply:
We’re delighted to hear that you are happy & satisfy with our app features and our service. Thank you very much for the great feedback.
Do get in touch with us for any queries through in-app chat or email us at hello@thimatic.com, we are always happy to help you.

author: Aroxfitness
body: Great app and great support. We use it for our bundle deals. We had some problems but the support fixed it within 10 minutes. thanks.
developer_reply:
Thank you for your valuable feedback, it’s always rewarding to hear kind words. :) :)
For any queries, contact us through in-app chat or email us at hello@thimatic.com, we are happy to help you.

author: Abela Online
body: We unfortunately chose the Thimatic’s Upsell app to sell our a-la-carte product in our store. This is undoubtedly the worst Shopify app available today (we use 33 other apps). So many blunders from the development team. They will randomly take their app offline to work on it without any communication to the client during PEAK ordering hours. The result? A big fat “404 Page not found” error for our valued customers. Total lack of communication among the app developer’s OWN STAFF. One of the team members will say the app is working fine and ask for a meeting for us to simulate the error (despite sending multiple screenshots/recordings to them). After showing the error in real time during the meeting to another team member “Mr. Jack”, he says this error is to be expected since they are working on it! So why call a meeting to show the error is happening? We would have given a negative star rating if there was such a thing.

author: Wrestlinggaphics.com
body: The customer service was great. They helped me set up the code for the app and place the bundles in the location I wanted in my store. Great so far.
developer_reply:
Thank you so much for such a great review. It encourages us to continue making improvements to our app. :)
In case of further assistance, feel free to contact us at hello@thimatic.com or via our app-in chat.

author: Mii-Estilo.com
body: Great app so far, only just installed it but can make exactly what is needed. Support works very well and is very quick to help.
developer_reply:
We’re grateful for your valuable feedback. It’s our pleasure to provide the best possible service to our customers.
For further queries please contact us at hello@thimatic.com or via our in-app chat. We are always happy to help you.

author: NAMELY CO
body: This is hands down the best Bundle + upsell APP on the market The customer service is next level! I literally searched hundreds of apps before i found this one! BEST IN THE BIZ!!!
developer_reply:
Thank you for finding great value in our app and our support. And our special thank you for recommending our app. It’s great to hear that you had a positive experience with us.
In case of further queries please contact us at hello@thimatic.com or via our in-app chat. We are always happy to help you.

author: Shapewear USA
body: Growave offers excellent support. Especially Alex among others who has been helping us with getting our website perfect. I have been using Growave for Reviews, Wishlist, Instagram Shopping, Social Login and Rewards. Definitely the most understanding support team that I have ever come across in this space. Growave as an app is good and integrates well with our theme. We of course would like some additional features, and Growave is working with us to accommodate this. I think if this keeps up we will definitely keep this app for the long haul. Thanks Growave!
developer_reply:
Hiya!🥳
There are not enough words to express my gratitude towards you team at Shapewear USA,
You have been always cooperative and amazingly patient and it was only our pleasure to fulfill your requirements. We highly value your feedback and would love to let you know that we are trying hard to get things keeping up all the time. 
It is true that we only get motivated by these insightful review, thank you so much for that. ❤️
Aspire to serve you in excellent manner every single day!

author: Plantish
body: Haven't implemented the app on our live store yet, but the customer service have been helpful. I will say there is a few delayed responses, but we usually get my problems solved.
developer_reply:
Hi team at Plantish,
Please accept our deepest gratitude for leaving a fabulous review and contributing your time to our growth! 😇
In our field our beloved merchants are foremost and therefore your feedback is highly appreciated by us. 
We are extremely grateful to you for choosing us and we are even more pleased to hear that there is a room for improvement and we promise that we will work hard on this point to polish it till perfection. Thank you so much for letting us know. 🤩
Please reach out if you have any questions, we’d love to chat with you!

author: Broker Leather
body: I'm not super tech-savvy, so being able to reach out to support for assistance has been very helpful. I like having all of these features within one app to retain loyal customers.
developer_reply:
Howdy😇!
Our whole team appreciates you for granting us with your cosmically cool review team at Broker Leather. We are gratified for the happiness of assisting you❤️.
More importantly, we are extremely grateful to you for choosing Growave. May you provide us with enough opportunities to serve you once again🎊.

author: Color Confidence
body: Really appreciate the support they provide and how quickly they've resolved any issues. Their tech team is great, very reliable.

author: GreenTeaEveryday
body:
We've been using this app for six months now. The most useful feature for us is Build Box (Customers can build their own box from the list of products).
Support service works flawlessly :) Of course, I would like to see further expansion of the application's capabilities. For example, functions such as:
Spend Amount - Get Discount, General Discount, Cart Discount. We wish success to the developers :)

author: Big Dog Bed Company
body: The app is simple to use, but does not allow the user to do very basic tasks without the intervention of the support team. Font cannot be changed, the position of H2 in the body of the tabs cannot be adjusted and the default position is completely inappropriate, closer to the paragraph above and much too great a distance from the paragraph to which the title relates. The support team is helpful and attentive, but it should be not be necessary to get them involved in very basic activities of using the app. The app is underdeveloped and should not have been released

author: Barefoot Artisan Soap Co
body: This app is soooo easy to use and it actually does what it says it will without having to embed code or make a bunch of modifications to fit my page. I ended up buying the full version because I needed many different tabs on many different products because we don't drop ship, our items are handmade and each unique with unique ingredients. But because I can customize each tab, I can have a neatly laid out product pages on Shopify now instead of a bunch of necessary information that customers have to sift though about our skincare products that they might not care about or want to read but that I think is good info for them to know. Now, they can choose what information they want to know, and it's up to them to decide if they want to read it but for my peace of mind, it's there but not junking up the page now. This product is PERFECT for beginners or people who have an online business but don't know all the ins and outs of embedded code or page placements or app size modifications and want to see their changes in real time when they're doing it so that they can make sure that they're doing it correctly and not making a bunch of mistakes that they'll have to change once they publish the page. The tabs are straightforward without a bunch of time consuming choices to have to make. If you're like me, you want a product that doesn't have million things to choose from because either you get overwhelmed at the amount of choices or you waste a lot of time trying to tweak the look of your page that could be spent on more important things for your business or you make a bunch of mistakes because you don't know what you're doing! This app makes the process easy because it is limited. So, if you're looking for a fancy app that's going to suck up all your time trying to build a few tabs on your pages with a million choices for font, color, design, etc, then this app isn't for you. Or if you know what you're doing or you have a degree in website design or html code or something, then this app isn't for you, but if you have better things to do with your business besides create tabs or don't really know how to use tabs on your website pages or any fancy stuff because you are a beginner or are just not website or computer savvy, then get this app! You'll be soooo glad that you did! Oh and the customer service is awesome too!

author: Your Mindful Treasures
body: I used this to add drop down menus to my product. Works really well! only thing i would change is that you cannot move the drop downs into the description, only above. I contacted them for assistance and they got back to me in seconds. Very Happy

author: BijouxBio
body: Allows you to place chosen amount of tabs in a location of your choice. Definitely worth the value. Used the free plan for a week, then upgraded. The tab functionality is smooth, and easy. The design options are well thought out. Support have responded within less than 24hrs and have been helpful with questions.

author: MAYONEUR
body: Perfect store locator. Good app. The owner of the app is a very helpful person if you have problems with it. Should advise this to more stores.
developer_reply:
Hey there,
sorry to hear you're having issues with my app.
I'm always happy to help you if you email me at support at awesomestorelocator.com.
1) I've removed the "Powered by" text from your locator.
2) Your map doesn't show, because you have to enable some APIs as described in the setup guide:
https://www.awesomestorelocator.com/google-maps-api-key-instructions
Again, I'm more than happy to help you via email support.
I'll also email you this reply.
Best,
Peter

author: Apomat Candles
body: super speedy support for this app! I used the wrong API selector as I have zero experience in this and they helped me figure out where I went wrong within no time the app was set up the exact way I wanted it! I tried another app before this one and quickly uninstalled it after trying this one! worth it!!!

author: Broseus & co
body: Really good I had a problem with an order, I installed the app after the order was placed so the app could not detect it. Customer support helped me identify that the order was fraud. Thank you
developer_reply:
Thank you for the great feedback, it's highly appreciated! 
We're checking the orders in real-time as they come in. For this, SEON has to be installed to be able to run the fraud check.
However, we are always looking for ways to help the merchants stay protected, so we're happy to provide insights for past orders as well.
We'll fight fraud together! 👊

author: All Best Beauty
body:
I just added this app today, have no comment on the fraud prevention yet.
But the customer service experience is really great till now. Thank you, Walter
developer_reply:
We are glad to see your feedback. Our goal is to provide the best customer service and it's lovely to see your appreciation. 😍
Let's fight fraud together! 👊
All the best, 
Walter

author: MOSKBITE
body: This app is a game-changer to prevent online fraud. I had many charged-back due to credit card fraud but the SEON app helps to prevent fraud with immediate results. In fact, the customer's service is very good. They are always online to help. I highly recommend the App.
developer_reply:
Thank you for the review! We appreciate your kind words and are happy to help your store in preventing future fraudulent orders and chargebacks. 
We'll fight fraud together! 👊

author: Lindsey Foard
body: Love the added protection against chargebacks with this app and you can't beat the support! I definitely recommend adding it to any online shop.
developer_reply:
Thank you for the feedback, we appreciate it! 😍
We're glad to protect you against chargebacks and more than happy to help at any time. We'll fight fraud together! 👊

author: Shop First Choice S.A
body: Great App with an easy-to-understand UI. It is very straightforward in what it sets out to do and does it well. Also has some great customization tools and great support! Walter is and was extremely helpful with everything. Thank you! You deserve more reviews!
developer_reply:
Thank you for the review, we love to hear your feedback! 😍
We're happy to help. We'll fight fraud together! 👊

author: EasySMX
body: SEON support team very good, online timely solutions to many of my problems.My store recevied Fraud order every week, also suffered a lot of losses,so I desperately needed a powerful App like Fraud fighters.
developer_reply: Thanks for the feedback, we highly appreciate it! We're happy to help you fight against fraud. 👊

author: 95gameshop
body: Just the best app support on all Shopify Market. Walter was with me for any support I required and also consult me due to security system
developer_reply:
Thanks for the great feedback! You're right, we aim to provide the best support experience. I'm always happy to help. 👊
Cheers,
Walter

author: Your Champagne Lifestyle
body: East set up, nice app. Had a question i needed help with and chatted with Walter. He answered straight away and was so helpful. Really appreciate it, thanks.
developer_reply:
Thank you for the review! It's great to hear you loved the seamless experience we aim to provide for customers. We're always happy to assist and any question is welcome. Our goal is to help you stay protected. 
Thanks for choosing SEON! 👊

author: Lpkyfurniture
body: I highly recomend this app. It has already saved me money by detecting fraudulent orders. The support is amazing here. I had some questions and Walter was able to connect me to a Zoom call and explain me everything and show me how things work. Do not hesitate to install!
developer_reply:
Thank you for the review, we love to hear your feedback! 😍
We are always happy to help and assist businesses in protecting their shop. We'll fight fraud together 👊

author: Besafe1st™
body:
Very helpful the support today verifying few topics related to the app. After being clear we have moved forward with the free plan service for now. As new here, we believe all will be great and peaceful for our Business having SEON. Fraud Fighters. Thank you,
Martin
BS1
developer_reply:
Hey Martin, thank you for the awesome review, we highly appreciate your feedback! We're always happy to assist and provide the best support possible. 
Our goal is to help merchants fight fraud and we believe great support is a must for the best experience. 
We're happy to help on this journey and protect you! 👊

author: CLASSY NERDY CHIC
body: I downloaded the app with ease. It was a straightforward setup and easy to use for customers. The company is very responsive and was open to suggestions.

author: ooohne
body: Wir haben die App nun seit einiger Zeit in Gebrauch und sind wirklich überzeugt. Gerade einige Schwächen in den Bereichen SEO und Code hatten wir noch nicht entdeckt. Klare Empfehlung!

author: Trelino® Composting Toilets
body: Gave this app a shot and it worked very well for me. It gives you a to do list that you can work on. It was in general very interesting to get an overview of my stores performance. And support is great, very quick to reply and very friendly.
developer_reply: Thank you for your review. It's already on our roadmap that some resulting tasks will be solved by the app for you. We expect to have the first "automatic fixes" ready at the end of the year.

author: VANLIV
body: Having all audits in one overview is really really handy. Missing some more details about the errors, but it's already very helpful. Thanks for the free check!

author: Adika IL
body:
AMAZING APP! BOA the app developer helped us with each request that we had.
the app integrates smoothly with checkout!
developer_reply: THANKS! Enjoy the app ❤️

author: מילות מעוצבות
body: האפליקציה עובדת נהדר! כמו כן היא מאוד הכרחית וכמעט שלא ניתן לאפשר ללקוחות חווית קניה בלעדיה. מוצר מצויין! שירות לקוחות מצויין!. תודה. The app works great! It is also very necessary and it is almost impossible to allow customers a shopping experience without it. great product! Excellent customer service !. Thanks
developer_reply: Thanks for this great review! We're happy to hear that you're enjoying the app and that it's improving your customers' shopping experience. Let us know if you ever have any trouble or think of any new features you would like to see.

author: Hampibag
body: האפליקציה עובדת מדהים, מאפשרת בצורה נוחה ללקוח לבחור נקודת איסוף קרובה לכתובת שהזין וזה עובד מושלם. בנוסף הצוות מאחורה תמיד שם לתת תמיכה, לפתור בעיות, ללמוד ולהשתפר. ממליץ בכל אתר
developer_reply: Thanks for your kind review - we're so glad that you're enjoying PickMeUp. If there's a feature you think is missing or ever have an issue, we're here to help!

author: Meydalle
body:
חיכיתי הרבה זמן לאפליקציה הזאת. היא מעולה!!
נוחה לתפעול וחוסכת הרבה זמן וטעויות.
מאפשרת חוויה טובה ונוחה ללקוחות שלי (וגם לי)
תודה רבה
developer_reply: Thanks for your kind review - we're so glad that you're enjoying PickMeUp. If there's a feature you think is missing or ever have an issue, we're here to help!

author: Magic Spoon
body: Brightflow has been incredibly helpful in delivering realtime, actionable business insights to our team. Robbie and team are responsive and diligent and the product is great!

author: Fellow
body: Brightflow delivers weekly reports on the breakdown between our ecommerce platforms to help deliver reliable and speedy insights that would otherwise take us hours to retrieve.

author: Cute Pots Plants
body: Love this app for two reasons! Great customer service, thanks Robbie and team! It has saved me tonnes of accounting time and given me back about 30 minutes of every day. I am so thankful for this!

author: Newmans Leathers
body: Amazing app. Amazing customer service. This app provides those extra cash flow and profit that would have otherwise been lost. Thanks for your help and a great team.

author: The Spices
body: The ability to create scenarios on top of our baseline budgets is invaluable when it comes to making business decisions. Will recommend this app for all Shopify users.

author: Happy Wax
body: Highly recommend Brightflow!  They have changed the way we think about our cash flow.  In the day-to-day, we can get a real-time picture of our actual cash flow without waiting for month-end.  And for the longer-term, their projections give us a multi-year view that helps us better plan for growth.

author: P.S. Good Times
body:
Using Brightflow, we were able to get our Accounts Receivable from over 100 days to ~40 days. Pretty darn cool. 
And now we have a much better sense of our cash flow and can foresee issues before they happen. Love this app.

author: The Flex Company
body:
So much to say, but the main upside we've found is:
1) we used to rely on Google sheets to manage finances and it took forever for our books to close. Now we can assess our business MUCH faster on an ongoing basis 
(2) the app helps us preserve cash by reducing our working capital needs
(3) Brightflow actually monitors and predicts potential issues, which has saved us, especially now as we're focused on safeguarding liquidity

author: Medicali Wholesale
body: 2 years with Flits and what an amazing team to work with, This app not only completely changes the look and feel for the customer, but adds so many features I did not have before like the Store credit feature,Referral Program, Earning rules, Spendings rules and much more. The support team is what puts this app over the top. They are dedicated to every site that uses their apps and personally helps them with any questions,set-up and beyond! They really outdid themselves on the DUO + UNO upgrades! No one compares! Thank you Flits!!

author: Candidpot.com
body: Excellent and prompt customer service. That's something they're incredibly good at. Keep up the good job, guys, because your ability to customise and reply quickly is incredible.

author: Flora & Curl
body: Fantastic and responsive customer service. They are really great with that. Keep up the great work guys, because your ability to offer customisation and be quick to respond is amazing.

author: Tea Life
body: Good service if there is something wrong, and seem to be invested in their product with updates and new features.

author: Equipement Sverige
body: We got all the help we wanted and it woked really good! We can really reccomend this app to customize you account page. :)

author: frontierenaturalmeats
body: The team over at Flits delivers! We needed more than Shopify's basic customer page. We needed an elegant dashboard with tabs for orders, addresses, rewards, and subscriptions. They were amazingly flexible when it came to incorporating information from 3rd party apps. And they even got UPS tracking info to show up on the orders tab. You all are the best!

author: Ichor Liquid
body:
Excellent App. Improves the customer's historical order experience and provides functionality to re-order amongst other features. Due to the complexity of my store, Flits did not work straight out the box and a lot of customisation to correct. This took a few days work, but the developers were there from the start and got everything working exactly how it should.
The other Re-Order apps I tried failed to complete a workable solution, however the developers of this app went over and above what was required. Full marks for this great company

author: The Man Company
body: A must have app! Have been using Flits for more than 3 years now, and the experience is great! Kudos to the whole team, for being so helpful & supportive everytime.

author: Campus&Co Brisbane
body: Have been successfully using this app for several years and can't fault it, and customer service is excellent. Well done, and keep it up!!!

author: Quadis | Foodies and Goodies
body: Great app within reasonable budget to manage a store credit/reward program The support team is outstanding - patient, helpful, fast.

author: ROGGENWOLF
body: Ich habe die CleverReach App in Verwendung um mein E-Mail Marketing abzuwickeln. Ich finde es gut, dass CleverReach direkt in Shopify integriert ist, jedoch funktioniert die Einbindung der Formulare nicht in eine Theme (obwohl dies angegeben wird). Ein selbst erstelles Formular von CleverReach kann nur auf einer eigenen Seite angelegt werden und die Anmeldequote dafür ist leider nicht sehr hoch. Sinnvoller ist es das eigene Layout direkt auf der Startseite, im Footer oder als Popup integrieren zu können.
developer_reply:
Hallo lieber Plugin User,
herzlichen Dank für die ausführliche Bewertung.
Eine ausführliche Erklärung, wie Formulare in Shopify eingebunden werden können, finden Sie unter: https://support.cleverreach.de/hc/de/articles/360036028213 . Dort finden Sie ebenfalls eine Anleitung, wie Sie das Formular direkt auf der Homepage einbetten können, zum Beispiel über den Theme Editor.
Bezüglich der PopUp-Funktion: Dies ist über unser Plugin leider erst in näherer Zukunft abbildbar. Aktuell gibt es dafür übergangsweise empfehlenswerte Tool, wie zum Beispiel Uptain.
Bei weiteren Fragen, sind Sie natürlich herzlich dazu eingeladen, unseren Support zu kontaktieren. Schreiben Sie uns dazu gerne eine E-Mail an support@cleverreach.de.
Freundliche Grüße
Ihr CleverReach Team

author: Dr Dennis Gross
body: It is too complicated. We didn’t figure out how to segment properly and flows are tricky to set up. The send A LOT of newsletters to you, be prepared!
developer_reply:
Hello dear plugin user,
Thank you very much for your open and direct evaluation.
We are of course sorry that the segmentation and comprehension of the processes is too complicated for you.
We would like to work with you to find a solution to these problems.
We offer free support in English, German and Italian via the e-mail address support@cleverreach.com.
As soon as any uncertainties or problems occur, you are always welcome to contact us.
If you write to us specifically about what is unclear about the segment function, we will be happy to provide you with specific assistance.
Regarding your perception of receiving too many newsletters:
You can unsubscribe from the newsletter at any time via the unsubscribe link.
It is only our intention to give as much help and work ideas as possible - because the plugin has so many useful functions.
We wish you a good time.
Kind regards
Your CleverReach Team

author: snoozi
body: Die Funktionen an sich sind gut, jedoch bin ich über den Kundensupport sehr enttäuscht. Wenn überhaupt eine Antwort kommt, dann erst Tage später
developer_reply:
Hallo lieber Plugin User,
zuerst möchten wir uns bedanken, dass Sie sich die Zeit genommen haben, eine Bewertung zu verfassen.
Aufgrund des aktuell hohen Serviceaufkommens kann es zu Verzögerungen bei der Beantwortung Ihrer Anfrage kommen. Wir arbeiten mit Hochdruck daran, Ihr Anliegen schnellstmöglich zu bearbeiten.
Wir bitten, etwaige Unannehmlichkeiten zu entschuldigen und danken Ihnen bereits vorab für Ihr Verständnis und Ihre Geduld.
Wir wünschen Ihnen eine gesunde Zeit.
Liebe Grüße
Ihr CleverReach Team

author: GreenUndies
body: We've been using the free version for 6 weeks, as we just startet with our shop and so far everything works perfectly fine.
developer_reply:
Hi GreenUndies,
thank you for your kind and positive feedback.
We are very pleased that working with the plugin meets your expectations.
If you still have feature requests or need support, please feel free to contact us at support@cleverreach.com.
We wish you a pleasant and healthy time.
Kind regards,
Your CleverReach team

author: Savage Roasters
body: I am using the free version. The test emails do not get received, so I send directly to the recipient with the same domain email as the website, but it still doesnt go through. I manage to send to my gmail as a recipient, not a test, but each time I do this, I need to make a copy of that email to send to my actual recipient list, leaving me with alot of the same emails in my list. There is no option to edit after an email has been sent, nor can I delete the test ones I sent to the gmail.
developer_reply:
Hi dear Savage Roasters team,
thank you for your detailed feedback.
First of all, I can completely understand that this causes displeasure to you.
A blocked mail can have several causes. 
We offer a variety of technical options to optimize the deliverability of your emails.
For example, in conjunction with our tool, setting an SPF record can improve deliverability.
Also, you can deposit a subdomain with us and use DKIM (DomainKeys Identified Mail).
Together with you, I would like to take a look at your individual possibilities and options in order to make the campaigns possible in an uncomplicated way.
For this reason, I have emailed you so that we can take a closer look at your concerns about unsent emails and editing and deleting sent campaigns.
We wish you a healthy time, a nice Christmas season and a pleasant end of the year.
Kind regards,
Your CleverReach team

author: GS Magazin
body: The app is easy to use. Also suitable for beginners. Has already brought me some results. Actually a must for every shop owner.
developer_reply:
Hi GS Magazin,
thank you so much for your positive feedback! And we totally agree with you: Email marketing is a must for every online shop owner. 
Wishing you all the best for your store!
Kind regards,
CleverReach

author: Footed Pajamas Co.
body: The app works extremely well.  Prices are in EU since the company is based out of there but the system deliveries and manages email marketing without any issues.
developer_reply:
Hey Footed Pajamas Co.,
we are very happy about the positive rating and wish you continued success with CleverReach®.
Kind regards,
CleverReach

author: RZCrew
body: The price plan described in their website and on the app are differents... Thanks for the waste of time.
developer_reply:
Hi RZCrew,
thank you for taking the time to give us a feedback. 
Our plugin itself is free of charge and you can create a free account in CleverReach as well. In the free account you can manage up to 250 recipients and send 1000 mailings a month. 
On the pricing side of the app you’ll find the notice:
„External charges may apply. These charges are billed by the external provider and won’t appear on your Shopify invoice. Free of charge test account available."
If you have further questions, feel free to contact us directly under support@cleverreach.com
Kind regards,
CleverReach

author: SafetyGloves by HexArmor
body: We had some initial issues and a possible bug where our application got stuck in a void loop where the application did not exist and I could not reapply. After many communications with Walmart support the issue was eventually resolved. Not through the Shopify app page support email, which leads to an un-monitored email FYI. Eventually, I was able to talk to the right contact and our application got through.
developer_reply:
Hi SafetyGloves by HexArmor,
As discussed on our email thread, we were able to provide you with the correct access link to the already approved application that was submitted previously. We are happy that we were given the chance to effectively resolve your issue. If further issues occur, please feel free to reach out directly to our support agent.
Thank you,
Walmart Marketplace Support

author: Congo Tropicals
body:
Edit: My browser Chrome had blocked some cookies that were needed for the app to function properly, after finding the issue and correcting it, i was able to resolve everything. Best fix would be checking allowed cookies and make sure your browser isn't blocking third party cookies which is needed for the app to work.
If anyone else is experiencing this issue, check your settings on chrome and allow all cookies. You can check by clicking on the lock symbol next to the address bar to see if your browser is blocking any of them. Hope this helps. the app keeps telling to edit the items in bulk menu, i watched the youtube videos, when looked thru the listings, it only has 2 options, edit category or publish item. The tab to edit products is non existing. items cant be edited from the shopify walmart app. can this get fixed??
developer_reply:
Hi Congo Tropicals,
Thank you for your feedback. A Walmart support agent will reach out shortly via email to discuss your issues in more detail.
Thank you,
Walmart Marketplace Support

author: yeehawcowboy
body: Great app.. easy to add items... strongly recommend it.. customer service is great as well.. Just wish you didn't have to change each sku to a different # example if your item # is dp5768 but you have multiple variants you have to make make it dp5768-1 dp5768-2

author: Equine Goddess(R)
body: Getting better - must say it was rocky starting out with this app. The shipping criteria, even with videos, is rather difficult. Now that I've struggled through for about a month, I finally understand it, and things are much smoother. Next step is bulk loading, so I'll report back after that.

author: PayandPack.com
body: The inventories are never synced on time from Shopify to Walmart, unless you manually change the quantity for SKU one by one, so the Walmart listings' inventory can be updated respectively. The only feature is FREE, you know, you pay what you got, free means.....
developer_reply:
Hi PayandPack.com,
Thank you for your feedback. A Walmart support agent will reach out shortly to discuss your issues in more detail.
Thank you,
Walmart Marketplace Support

author: rbeey
body: HORRIBLE APP...App never synced tracking information back to Walmart and I had to manually update tracking information for all orders otherwise Walmart would have cancelled my orders and pay me nothing....was it even tested before rolling out....If there was a bug at least add exemption in seller account to prevent revenue loss to customers. Going to delete this as soon as my orders are delivered. If you expect quality from sellers to ship on time and process everything on time at least give back the quality to sellers.
developer_reply:
Hi rbeey,
Thank you for your feedback. A Walmart support agent will reach out shortly to discuss your issues in more detail.
Thank you,
Walmart Marketplace Support

author: LaughingMooseGifts
body: Earlier this year I installed this app when we began selling on the Walmart Marketplace. The first order we shipped was never paid for by Walmart because the shipping information didn't post back to the Walmart Admin Portal; Walmart canceled the order because 'it was way late' even though the customer had long since taken delivery. We have had multiple late orders in the Walmart Admin panel in the past few months either because they never were pushed through to Shopify and consequently to our order management system. Or because orders were shipped, but never updated as shipped back to the Walmart Admin Portal. What a disaster. Honestly I don't understand why this app exists on the Shopify App Store.
developer_reply:
Hi LaughingMooseGifts,
Thank you for your feedback. We are looking into this and will provide an update shortly. Please be on the lookout for an email from one of our support agents regarding this matter.
Thank you,
Walmart Marketplace Support
